name: Sugar Rush (itch) (Maker School)
description:
You use the arrows to control the direction of the player which is the box.

When you eat the lollipops your score will increase.

Aviod the bombs otherwise you will lose lives, when you eventually run out of lives the game will end.

There will be obstacles moving across the screen, do not run into them otherwise you will lose lives.

Once you collect the force field you can run into any object and wont lose lives. Although once you run into an object your force field will disapear.

The green and black objects are cleaner so when you collect one everything will disapear except for the food.
